pages.text: $(li)The Diamond Wolf Armor is the upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/golden_wolf_armor)Golden Wolf Armor$(/l) that you can equip to your tamed $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/wolf)Wolf$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:pets/quark/foxhound)Foxhound$(/l).
$(li)To equip it, shift right click on your tamed Wolf or Foxhound while you are holding this item in your hand and place it in the Armor Slot.
